title: Hour 2 - A's Historic Decline, Richard Roeper
itunes:title: Hour 2 - A's Historic Decline, Richard Roeper
description:
Dan weighs in on the struggles in Oakland and the possibility of the A's moving to Las Vegas. And film critic Richard Roeper stops by to preview the summer blockbuster movie season.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
